definition: bitter water (e.g. mineral water containing sulfates)/suffering/digestive fluids rising from stomach to the mouth/fig. bitter complaint
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to pour out one's grievances
to have bitter digestive fluids rising to the mouth/fig. to complain bitterly/to pour out one's sufferings

sentences.english: Jas. 3:11 Does the spring, out of the same opening, gush forth the sweet and the bitter?
sentences.chinese: 雅三11泉源從同一個眼裏能湧出甜水和苦水麼？

sentences.english: Therefore their people turn to them and drink up waters in abundance.
sentences.chinese: 所以神的民歸到這裏，喝盡了滿杯的苦水。

sentences.english: Split place, bitter water place, is the name, the yellow corn, white corn, came from there.
sentences.chinese: 在那苦水之濱，養育了黃玉米與白玉米。

sentences.english: Amy through the rare opportunity to walk to zhao to grumble.
sentences.chinese: 艾米藉着難得的散步機會向趙來大倒苦水。

sentences.english: I poured out my own bitterness to her.
sentences.chinese: 把自己的苦水向她全部倒了出來，她也急得沒有辦法。

sentences.english: Do not go into a long list of complaints and sores.
sentences.chinese: 不要倒出一大堆抱怨和苦水。

sentences.english: Several days later God had given them sweet water instead of bitter.
sentences.chinese: 過了幾天，神又使苦水變成甜水。

sentences.english: The person that succeed often drinks bitter water first, drink fresh water again.
sentences.chinese: 成功者常常是先喝苦水，再喝甜水。

sentences.english: Jennifer responded with anger and played the martyr role.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮弗做出憤怒的反應，開始大倒苦水。

sentences.english: Therefore his people return hither: and waters of a full cup are wrung out to them.
sentences.chinese: 所以神的民歸到這裏，喝盡了滿杯的苦水。

sentences.english: Liu major grievances to the cousin, cousin to Jia Zhijie help pleasant colors.
sentences.chinese: 劉文向表弟大吐苦水，讓表弟幫忙給夏志傑點兒顏色。
